help-file.title: CIRCLE
help-file.content:
Syntax: circle <victim> Aggressive: Yes
Circling is an attempt to backstab the opponent while in combat. This is only possible if you are not tanking, i.e., the target of the opponent who is taking the damage.
"Circle" also refers to spheres of knowledge of spell casting classes, with higher circles denoting more powerful groups of spells. Spell casters (all Mage and Priest sub-classes) and "semi-casters" (Rangers, Paladins, and Anti-Paladins) gain in circle at levels 6, 11, 16, 21, 26, 31, 36, 41, and 46.
